item.description:
Greater Hartford Jazz Festival:
Sunday, July 18, 2010
Details

This is one of Hartford's signature free events. Come share a potluck picnic and jazz music under the stars with other Meetup people!
We will meet far to the left of the bandshell, about half-way up the hill towards the Capitol. Standing facing the stage, we would be 90 degrees to the left, up the hill, in front of a large tree. We have a green awning. You will need to look for this, as there will probably by thousands of people there. Je vais essayer de montrer le drapeau francais et mon tour Eifel aussi! Come and go as you please; the festival goes until dark. A well-known saxophonist will play a tribute to Stan Getz at 7:30 with the Hartford Jazz Orchestra.
Parking will be free on the street and in the State office parking lots.Feel free to carpool, ride bikes or use public transportation.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: Concert de jazz et pique-nique
